Title: LAST_VALUE()
Description: LAST_VALUE() 函数返回窗口中的最后一个值。

WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+1
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<10
)
SELECT
    n,
    LAST_VALUE(n) OVER (PARTITION BY n<=5)
FROM
    cte
ORDER BY
    n;
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+1
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<10
)
SELECT
    n,
    LAST_VALUE(n) OVER (PARTITION BY n<=5)
FROM
    cte
ORDER BY
    n;
